name: Hey, Ms. President
description:
A game about power and press conferences but also making sandwiches, and taking care of your Swiss Cheese plant. Also there is a machine which whispers to you.

Short, text-based, choose your way through it. It's like a twine game, but I didn't make it with twine. An interactive story with 6 different endings and an almost infinite* number of sandwiches. 

How will you abuse your power? How do you feel when you sit on a plane? What do you imagine when you pretend to be ordinary? How will you evade all those pesky journalists with their annoying questions?

*not even nearly infinite, actually 116280.
